name: OutAThyme
description:
Description: 

The Thyme Lord, Eater of Soup, Enjoyer of Meals, Restaurant Connoisseur Extraordinaire,  Breaker of Cheese, has demanded you make him a superb soup of epic proportions. As you journey into your kitchen you soon realise...

You're out of thyme! 

The clocks ticking, the sinks are overflowing, and the kitchen is amuck with chaos. The Thyme Lord, in his everlasting generosity has offered to take care of the kitchen. He has tasked you with completing the Thyme Lord's trial. 

Will you be able to brave the dangers. Will you be able to best the Thyme Lord's test? 

Controls:

  • W,A,S,D - Movement 
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Shift (In Air) - Fast Drop

Credits:

  • - Kieran Rowland - Project Lead, Programmer, Level Design
  • - Sean Trewin - 3D Modeller 
  • - Liam Clark - Art, Level Design
  • -Andrew Lowes - 3D Modeller

Assets Used:

  • https://opengameart.org/content/green-salon Menu Music by Yubatake
  • https://opengameart.org/content/crocorocket Level Music by Johan Brodd
  • https://opengameart.org/content/100-cc0-sfx https://opengameart.org/content/40-cc0-water-splash-slime-sfx Various SFX by rubberduck
  • https://opengameart.org/content/fantasy-sound-effects-tinysized-sfx Various SFX by Vehicle
